plot: While at an exclusive, expensive resort, a woman schemes to ruin her ex-lover's financial empire using sex as a distraction.
title: Tres riche
plot_es: While at an exclusive, expensive resort, a woman schemes to ruin her ex-lover's financial empire using sex as a distraction.
plot_en: While at an exclusive, expensive resort, a woman schemes to ruin her ex-lover's financial empire using sex as a distraction.
